name: ML CI/CD Pipeline

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main

jobs:
  train:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v4
        with:
          python-version: "3.11"

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: pip install -r requirements.txt

      - name: Train model
        run: python scripts/train.py

      - name: Upload model & metrics
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v3
        with:
          name: model-artifacts
          path: |
            model/
            metrics.json

  deploy:
    needs: train
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Download artifacts
        uses: actions/download-artifact@v3
        with:
          name: model-artifacts

      - name: Compare metrics
        run: |
          CURRENT=$(python -c "import json;print(json.load(open('metrics.json'))['accuracy'])")
          BEST=${{ vars.BEST_ACCURACY }}

          if (( $(echo "$CURRENT <= $BEST" | bc -l) )); then
            echo "2022BC ---- Metric did not improve"
            exit 0
          fi

      - name: Login to Docker Hub
        run: echo "${{ secrets.DOCKER_TOKEN }}" | docker login -u "${{ secrets.DOCKER_USERNAME }}" --password-stdin

      - name: Build and Push Docker Image
        run: |
          docker build -t ${{ secrets.DOCKER_USERNAME }}/wine-api:latest .
          docker push ${{ secrets.DOCKER_USERNAME }}/wine-api:latest
